Detailed Description

To send data to a single UPD port (socket) - abstraction layer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RODOS::UDPOut::UDPOut ( const long  portNr,
const char *  hostname = "localhost" 
)

Constructor for connection to remote host known by name. WARNING: Negativ port number uses the abs port number and sends broadcast

Parameters:
portNrport number on remote host, negativ -> broadcast to this port
hostnameIP-hostname of remote host
RODOS::UDPOut::UDPOut ( const long  _portNr,
unsigned long  _ipAddr 
)

Constructor for connection to remote host known by IP-address.

Parameters:
_portNrport number on remote host
_ipAddrIP-address of remote host, e.g. format as hex 0x01020304, where 01 = ip_part1, ...

int  ip0,
int  ip1,
int  ip2,
int  ip3 
)

Constructor for connection to remote host known by IP-address.

Parameters:
_portNrport number on remote host
ip0,ip1,ip2,ip3IP-address of remote host consisting of separate octets

Returns:
true - connected, false - not connected

const int  maxLen,
unsigned long  ipAddr

Send user data to a given address

Parameters:

Returns:
